I'm really not sure how I feel about this. When I first created my account on this site, I would've eaten this shit right up. I absolutely loved wholesome stuff. But at this point, it almost feels like it's *too* wholesome.... *too* normal. My desires have changed completely. I want something more ROUGH, whether that be in the form of NTR or anything else. While I'm on that topic, I don't hate NTR as much as I did in my previous years. Overall though? Absolutely stunning art, but the story itself gives me mixed emotions.
